plot: Mixed Trailer of the 3rd Volume of two Sport-documentaries "Esteghlalish Blue" & "Persepolis Men" about the 2 Hottest Soccer Teams during 2009-2010 Iranian Premier League which unfortunately, none of the movies has ever been completed.
title: Esteghlalish Blue, Persepolis Men
